channel.title: Pages on Careful, Icarus.
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Careful, Icarus.

item.title: About
item.description: “Careful, Icarus” comes from a cold-open on TLLS with Craig Ferguson: It’s become a mantra of sorts for me, and it seemed like the perfect name for a blog. Now about me: I work as a sysadmin, dealing with mostly Linux machines. Father of three. I’m a musician, but I don’t play out as much as I used to - still love it, though.
